desc: Maladaptive daydreaming is one of the fastest growing mental ailments facing people today. Maladaptive daydreaming works discreetly by devouring hours of your day routinely without you even noticing. Maladaptive daydreaming can be incredibly disruptive to your real life and this site aims to help.

layout.text: How my struggles with maladaptive daydreaming led me to develop a seven-step method and four "tricks"...
